cast.name: 理查德·比弗斯 Richard Beavers

director.name: 理查德·比弗斯 Richard Beavers

introduction: “What lives in the space between the stones, in the space cupped between my hand and my chest? Filmmaker/stonemason. A tower or ruin of rememberance. With each swing of the hammer I cut into the image and the sound rises from the chisel. A rhythm, marked by repetition and animated by variation; strokes of hammer and fist, resounding in dialogue. In this space which the film creates, emptiness gains a conour strong enough for the spectator to see more than the image - a space permitting vision in addition to sight”.
